scripts.build-rust: cargo build --release && cd crates/tracer && wasm-pack build --debug -t web
scripts.build-wasabi: cd wasabi/crates/wasabi_js && npm run build && wasm-pack build --target web && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --out-dir ../../../dist/wasabi && cd ../../..
scripts.build-binaryen: cd binaryen && git submodule update --init && cmake . && make -j
scripts.build-full: npm run build-rust && npm run build-wasabi && npm run build-binaryen && npm run build
